title: Stand alone building / Group of buildings in IT Parks with a minimum built-up area of 20,000 sq
clause_text: Stand alone building / Group of buildings in IT Parks with a minimum built-up area of 20,000 sq.ft. will also be eligible for above benefits. (1)
section: (1) 7.8.2 For areas except areas mentioned in Regulation No.7.8.1 above and expect Regional Plan areas

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Stand alone building / Group of buildings in IT Parks with a minimum built-up area of 20,000 sq.ft. will also be eligible for above benefits. (1)
